comment.author: 76501550@N04
comment._content: Hi! My name is Dennis Crombaugh. I am from Indianapolis, IN. Willa Brown is my mother's aunt so that makes her my great aunt. I have the Bible she used until the end of her life. I'm proud to be a part of the rich legacy of Willa Brown.

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment.authorname: San Diego Air & Space Museum Archives
